subject: Re: [junit] JUnit/Ant test case issue
msgSnippet: if you are using ANT s exec task to execute IE, set the spawn attribute = true.
messageBody:
if you are using ANT's "exec" task to execute IE, set the "spawn"
attribute = true.

On Apr 11, 2005 11:15 AM, romut06 <softromu@...> wrote:
>
>
> Hello all,
> I don't know where to post this question (Ant or JUnit), so I decided
> to post both, so I apologize in advance if I'm not in the right forum.
>
> Here is the problem :
> I execute a test suite with a Ant task, in command line. One test
> case, within this suite, opens an Internet Explorer window.
>
> All the test cases are well executed. But at the end of the campaign,
> the Ant JUnit task never ends until this IE window is closed.
>
> I'ev tried to put a specific task to close it and I know it works well
> but it is never executed as the JUnit task doesn't end because of the
> damned IE.
>
> Any help will be greatly appreciated.
>
>
>
>
>
>
